https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lxYPBGZQIlzKbwIoy5Yi8OLaa2e.jpg For the past 20 years, the world has seen an alarming decrease in IQ and a rise of autism and behavioral disorders. This international scientific investigation reveals how chemicals in objects surrounding us affect our brain, and especially those of fetuses. Brains in Danger
